title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: South Park Elementary, Garrison's class. A group of visiting kids in yellow G.G.W.K. shirts stands next to Garrison

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Okay, children, we have a special guest today, a woman recruiting young people for a national choir tour. Now I know that choir tours are totally stupid and lame , but please, give her your full attention.  Go ahead.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Uh. Thank you, Mr. Garrison.  How are we all doing today?!  I can't hear you! I said, How are we all doing?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric Cartman, you say "excuse me"!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Okay.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Go ahead.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Children, we are a national choir called, "Getting Gay With Kids!" We're gonna do a big tour down in Central America to help save the rainforest, and you can be a part of it!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (This sounds fucking screwed)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Kenny McCormick, you speak when you're spoken to!!  Go ahead.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You see, we take kids from all over the country and put them in a choir where we sing and dance to raise awareness about our vanishing rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Did you know over 10,000 acres of rainforest are bolldozed every year?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: That's right. And over 30% of the world's oxygen  is made in the rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: So, who wants to join the fun??

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What if you don't have any rhythm?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Excuse me?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, like my friend Kyle. He's Jewish, so he doesn't have any rhythm.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Shut up, fatass!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Choirs suck.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Kyle Broflovski, you watch your language!! Eric Cartman, you be nice to people!! Stan Marsh, you mind your manners!! Kenny McCormick, you pay attention!! Go ahead.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, uh, that's all, really.  So, if anyone is interested in seeing the rainforest and joining our choir, I'll leave information packets up front.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, that's good. We need some more toilet paper.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: All right, that does it!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Mr. Mackey's office. The kid in the blue aviator cap isn't sitting on the bench outside, as he usually is

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I am tired of seeing you in my office, young man!  You get sent here every day, Craig!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I know.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Why can't you behave?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ...I don't know.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What do you have to say for yourself?! Well, I tell you what, young man. Uh, you're gonna be held back a grade if you don't luh-  Did you just flip me off?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yes you did, you just flipped me the bird! Now, see? This is exactly what I'm talking about! If you don't shape up, mkay, and get your head straight, uh-  There! You just flipped me off again!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No I didn't.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yes you did! And until you stop flipping people off, you can just go back to the waiting room, mkay?! Next!  Well, well, well, if it isn't Stan, Kyle, Kenny, and Eric.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hey, Craig.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Ey, don't flip me off, you son of a bitch!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Sit down, boys. Now, let's see. What did Mr. Garrison send you in here for? "The boys were being rude while a choir teacher was giving some stupid presentation-"

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: It's just some dumb activist kids' choir thing.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Uh, young man, "Getting Gay With Kids" is not dumb, mkay? It just so happens that I'm on the board of directors.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Dude! All those choirs are the same. They don't even really sing. They use prerecorded tapes.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, guess what, boys? I think that "Getting Gay With Kids" is just what you need. I'm gonna sign up all four of you.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You can't do that!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Woohoo!)  (I mean, 'Oh.')

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I think this will be very good for you

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: But we don't even care about the rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: And that's exactly why you need to go!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Please, Mr. Mackey, we'll be good. Don't send us to that ole kids' choir. Have mercy, Mr. Mackey.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Kyle's house, some days later. The Get Gay With Kids bus pulls up to Kyle's house to pick up Kyle, Cartman, and Stan

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Be safe, Kyle. Bring me something back from the rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, nonono. The rainforest is very fragile. We must take only pictures and leave only footprints.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, I didn't realize.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Did you know that right now, bulldozers are tearing down thousands of acres of rainforest every day?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aw, man, this is gonna suck donkey balls.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Please don't make me go on a choir tour, Mom, please!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Stan, you should be excited. I would love to see the rainforest. Besides, your dad and I need some time alone.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Nooo-ho!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Okay, children, that's all of us. We're ready to head for the Latin American nation of Costa Rica, a country filled with virgin rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Whoopee.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: And you must be Eric Cartman. I've heard about you. You don't respect nature or other cultures.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah, pretty much.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, I'm gonna change the way you think, kiddo.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: My name's Kelly.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (My name's Kenny.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Lenny?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (No, it's Kenny.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Johnny?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Kenny!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Now, we've got a looong trip ahead of us, so let's take the opportunity to learn our choreography.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The nightmare begins.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The bus rolls along. A map pops up, showing the bus's route, and Latin music plays. It croses the border at Mexicali, goes down the Baja peninsula, takes a ferry to Mexico and cuts across the North to the Gulf, then snakes down Central America to Costa Rica. They arrive at San José.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, look, children! I think we're entering San José, which is the capital of Costa Rica.  Oh! This is so exciting!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh my God! Dude, look at how dirty and crappy everything is!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, Costa Rica is a Third-World country. These people are much poorer than those in the U.S.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, why the hell don't they get jobs?! Ey! Why don't you people quit slacking off, and get a job! What's wrong with you?! Go to college!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, sit down!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Look, you've gotta be firm with these people or they just slack off and be poor forever. Right, Kenny?  Hey, maybe that's it, Kenny. Maybe you're Costa Rican; that's why your family's so poor.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Argh! That's just so untrue.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Your family isn't poor?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Whoa, dude, look over there!  Wow! Costa Rican prostitutes! Hey, look at the prostitutes, you guys!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What are chu looking at, man?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah, why don't chu take a peekture?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Okay.  Kugheek!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, SIT DOWN!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: the bus stops at the Centro Nacional de Costa Rica and all exit

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Kids, this is the Costa Rican Capitol building. This is where all the leaders of the Costa Rican government make their-

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh my God,  it smells like ass out here.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: All right, that does it!  Eric Cartman, you respect other cultures this instant!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I wasn't saying anything about their culture, I was just saying their city smells like ass.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Wow, seeing a place like this really makes you appreciate living in America, huh?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Uh-huh.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You may think that making fun of Third-World countries is funny, but let me-

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I don't think it's funny! This place is overcrowded, smelly, and poor! That's not funny, that sucks!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, will you please, please, just keep your mouth shut while we present ourselves to the Costa Rican President?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Why?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Because I'll buy you some ice cream afterwards if you do.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eh-heheh!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: inside the Capitol. All seem to be facing the President

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, it was a long trip, but the children are very excited to sing tomorrow.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¿Qué?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Uh, we're, uh, we're the choir? That, that was sent from... the United States?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¿Qué?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: We're the group singing for the "Save The Rainforest" summit tomorrow?  Oh dear, where's, where's Mr. Mackey? He should have been here by now.  Children, do any of you speak Spanish?  Don't you dare!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Sorry I'm late.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Ogh! Thank goodness you're here; I don't speak any Spanish.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, no problem.  Usted es choir de Estados Unidos, mbien?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¡O! ¡O! Save The Rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeess!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Pablo los llevará en un tur de la jungla.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Uh, he says Pablo here will take you on a rainfoest tour.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh boy! Mr. Presidente, round up your subjects outside. We have a special gift for you. The gift... uh-of song.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¿Qué?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: On the Capitol steps

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: All right, children, Let's get in our rows quickly, so we can begin.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Did you remember all the choreography, Lenny?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Yeah, I think so)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hello, everybody. This is just a little rehearsal for tomorrow, so we may be a little rusty.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Tootin' tootin' to, tada choo choo wow!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Men sing] There's a place that is magical, and full of rain.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Women sing] But now it needs help, because it is in pain.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Men sing] Cleaning the earth is a mighty big chore

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [All sing] We're spreading awareness like never before!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Chorus] Getting Gay With Kids is here! [Kyle is out of step now

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: To spread the word and bring you cheer

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Let's save the rainforest! What do you say?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Being an activist is totally gay!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Bridge. Man sings] Someday if we work hard, boys and girls,

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Woman sings] There'll be nothing but rainforests covering the
text: entire world!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Chorus. Kids rush into the audience and bring some members back as new partners

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Getting Gay With Kids is here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: To spread the word and bring you cheer. Yeah!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Move to E flat] Getting Gay With Kids is here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Let's save the rainforest! It's totally gay!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: the kids regroup and Kyle stumbles into place. The tape is stopped and the subjects just walk away

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Great job, gang! You were really all over the place, Kyle.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Thanks!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I told you Jewish people don't have rhythm!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Fuck off, Cartman!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No, dude! I think Cartman might actually be right.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No! That's a stereotype.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Dude! Maybe you really don't have any rhythm.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Next day, the sun rises over a sea of cccccc, the canopy of the rainforest. The choir teacher and her group are touring with Pablo

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: This is now secondary rainforest we are entering. Notice the canopy of foliage.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, it's everything I ever dreamed it would be!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: God-damn, it's hot out here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aaah! Snake!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No, dude. That's a branch.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh.  Aaah! Snake!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No. That's the same branch again.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The rainforest is very delicate, and we must take steps to protect it.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah yeah yeah, take steps to protect it, blah blah blah.  We here this a million times back up in the States.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Here! Look! These are squirrel monkeys. Endangered inhabitants of the rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Wow! Isn't he neat, Lenny?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Bad! Bad monkey!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, what the heck are you doing??

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I'm asserting myself. It's tough love. Just like my Mr. Kitty. When he's bad I say, "Uh that a bad Mr. Kitty!" and I smack him on the head!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: And here is a three-toed sloth.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: It's bad! It's a bad three-toed sloth!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, for God's sake, knock it off!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Respect my authoritah!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, Mr. Pedro, this was a great tour, but I guess we should be getting back. We have a big concert tomorrow, Don't we, kids?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: YEAH!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I wish we could have seen the Yanogapa.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What's the Yanogapa?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The Yanogapa are gentle native people that live in the rainforest, but bulldozers are destroying their homes. Soon, they will have nowhere to go. So we must stop bulldozing the rainforest so that they can live-!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aagh Ghyod, here she goes again!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: AAAAAAA!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Stanley, what is it?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: SNAAAKE!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, yes. Uhthis is what we call a coral snake. Notice the red markings. Quite an amazing creature.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: AAAAAAA!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What's the matter, little boy?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: He's a little wuss, what's it look like?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I'm just a-scared of snakes.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Naw, naw. You must remember. This snake is more afraid of us than we are of it.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Oh!! [the snake bites him all over the face. Stan looks and drops
text: the foliage so as to hide, and Pablo falls]

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh my God!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah, that snake is really scared of us all right!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Jesus Christ, is he dead?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Dude!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: My guess would be 'yes.'

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, no! God, no, no!  Don't panic, children

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Bad! That's a bad snay-ah!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The sun sets over the rainforest. The choir teacher now guides the group...

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Maybe we came from that way.  No, nno. Let's try this way.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Benny? Do you think we're gonna be okay?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Look. Everything is fine.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: That's good. Can I tell you something?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Okay.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I think I like you.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Really?!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah. I mean, I think we communicate really well.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Oh, that's great!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No, that's not good.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (That's not good?)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No. See, if I start to like you too much,  I'm only going to get my heart broken. 'Cause we live on opposite ends of the country.  Once this choir tour is over, we'll never see each other again.  And that would devastate me. So I can't have any feelings for you, I just can't, Lenny!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Aaaargh!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, children, the sun is setting. We have to find our way out of here quick!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The sun sets and the moon appears over the rainforest. Lightning flashes and the camera slowly drops to ground cover

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Whoa-kay, okay, everything is just fine, kids. Now it is important that we all stick together. Is everybody still here?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I'm not.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Who's not?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Me.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Benny, will you hold my hand?  I don't want to get emotionally attached, though.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh my God, dude!! I just saw Tony Danza!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No, you didn't just see Tony Danza, Stanley.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Next day. The sun rises over the Centro Nacional. A rooster crows. A maasive stage is prepared for the Save the Rain Forest summit. It looks like an amphitheatre, with a scaffold holding ten speakers over the stage and bullhorns atop the pillars. Balloons and a Save the Rain Forest banner are also anchored to the scaffold

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Bueno, bueno. Pongan el arcoiris al lado de las tortugas muertas. (Put the rainbow next to the picture of dying sea turtles.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Buenos dias, Señor Presidente, ¿mbien? (Hello, El Presidente)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¿Qué tal? ¿Está todo bien? (Oh hello. Is everything going okay?)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Uh, muy bien. Señor Presidente, um... ¿Usted no ha visto el coro, no, mm-hm bien? (Oh fine, fine... You, uh, haven't seen the choir have you?)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¡¿QUÉ?! (WHAT?!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Parece que anoche no regresaron al hotel, hmbien. (Well, they never came back to the hotel last night...)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¡¿Está bromeando, Mackey?! ¡¡¡Más de cien mil personas atenderan este evento!!! ¡¿Y me dice usted que no tendré a mis chiquitos lindos para que les canten?! (You've got to be kidding!! I have over a hundred thousand people coming to this event!!! Are you telling me that I have no darling little kids to sing to them?!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Estoy seguro que-uh-mmm, que-aaah llegá- llegáran. No se preocupe. Eh, olvidelo, ¿yeah-mbien? (I am sure they'll get here. No problem, forget I said anything.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: At the same time, in the rainforest, the group rises and marches on

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Dude, we're totally lost! We're gonna die out here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: We are?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Don't worry, Kelly. We're gonna find our way out of the rainforest and make it back to the concert in time. We just need to respect our mother rainforest so that she will respect us.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Miss Stevens, you have a bug on your back.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, really? Could you brush it off?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Um, no.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, boy oh!! Oh my God, get it off me!! For the love of God, get it off me!! Oh my God!!  Oh-okay, children. We must understand that the insects of the rainforest help the delicate balance of life here.  Oh my God!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Rainforests suck! I wanna go home!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Me, too!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Shh. Children, okay, let's try to listen to what the rainforest tells us. And if we use our ears she can tell us so many things. Perhaps-

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aaaaa! There's a dude here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, thank goodness! Hello, sir. We are lost.  Cah heh, can you help us?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¿Qué?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Let me try, let me try. We are from America. A-me-ri-ca.  We are lost and verry hungry. Necesito burri-tos.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I don't wanna burrito, I want a taco. Supreme.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Y taco.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I want two tostadas and mild sauce.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Two tostadas and mih-um enchilito.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Boys, please. Not every Spanish person eats tacos and burritos. That's a stereotype. Children, he wants us to follow him! Oooh, thank goodness! I think this ordeal is over!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The group arrives at a military camp deep in the rainforest. Soldiers go about their maneuvers. The kids pass a small barbed-wire bunker

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: This doesn't look very safe.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah. I think we should get the hell out of here.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Now kids, let's be a bit more "open-minded." I read all about this in Newsweek; this is a "people's army." They are fighting the fascist policies of their fascist government.  Oh, hello. Do you speak of English?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Who are you?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, wonderful! We were lost, and it is such a great coincidence we found you. You see, we're here to protest the government-sanctioned raping of your rainforest.  We are fighters, just like you. Could you help us get back to San José?  Um...  Oh, I know! Perhaps you would like a gift.. Well, we have o-honly-hee one gift to give. The gift... of song

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Honh.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Kyle, for the love of God, do the right choreography.  Oh, Kyle, please!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Enough!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well, we hope that our gift of song has warmed your hearts.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: We're not getting gay with any kids, okay?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Uh, yah, soooo, do you have a phone we could use?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Heehee yes, we have a phone. It's right over there next to the 12-person jacuzzi. Now, get out of here before we kill you!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Is it because of the little Jewish boy's choreography?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hey!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You white Americans make me sick! You waste food, oil, and everything else because you're so rich, and then you tell the rest of the world to save the rainforest because you like its pretty flowers.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: two Costa Rican soldiers can be seen behind the gasoline barrels. They pop up and open fire. The people's army immediately responds, and bullets fly everywhere. The kids scream

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¡Rapido, rapido!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Run, children, run!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Back in San José

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¡¿Donde putos está el coro?! ¡El espectáculo comienza pronto! (Where the hell is our choir?! The show is supposed to start soon!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No se preocupe, ¿mbien? El Presidente, estáran aqui. Este evento es muy importante para que la maestra del coro se lo pierda. ¿M-m-mbien? (Don't worry, El Presidente, they'll be here. This is too important for the choir teacher to miss.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Back in the rainforest. The choir now walks along a river bank

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hello?? Anybody?? Hellp??

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Wow, look at the pretty flower.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh nonono, Jake. That fragile flower is very delicate, okay?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aaaah. Ugh, help!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Ga-ow!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I wanna go home!  I hate the rainforest!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Oh, there, there now. There's nothing to be afraid of, dear.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh Lenny, hold me.  No, I can't get attached.  Oh, but I do like you.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Well, I like you-)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, but you're only going to leave me.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Oh, God damn it!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: San José. The reporters for the telecast have arrived and are in position

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: We're here live in San José, Costa Rica, where hundreds of rich Americans have gathered for the Save the Rain Forest summit. Everyone is here so they can feel good about themselves, and act like they aren't the ones responsible for the rainforest's peril.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: That's right, Bob, and of course the main attraction today is the darling kids' choir, "Getting Gay With Kids," all of whom must be backstage preparing at this very moment.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The rainforest. The terrain looks familiar...

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, there's just no end to this place! I think maybe we're going in circles. Oh, dear God! The summit starts in an hour; I'm gonna lose my job!  Aaaah!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I'm sick of this bullcrap! I'm not following this hippie around anymore.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric, where are you going?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I'm going this way!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Young man, I am the adult here, and I say you go this way!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Look: you can stay over here, but I'm going over here.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Young man, I have had it!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Nononono! You here, me here! Screw you guys, I'ma going home.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Good! You deserve to die, you little bastard!  Eric, we have to stay together!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric moves through the rainforest

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: God-damned stupid hippie activist! I should be home nestled in the couch with my Mr. Kitty right now watching Fat Abbot cartoons and eat-  Yes! I knew it! I'm saved!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Back by the river

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hey. Maybe Cartman was right.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah. It happened once before.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: No. The Spirit of Maya has told me to go this way.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: At the clearing

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Mister! You've gotta help me! I'm starving to death!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What are you doing here, little boy?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: I was with my class, and we got all lost in the rainfoest, and I need some food. I'm fading fast!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Lost in the rainforest? Oh, my Lord! Where are all the others?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Food! I have to have food!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh my God! Get this child some food, quick!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Chicken wings.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Chicken wings!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Medium spicy.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: San José

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Start the show! Start the show! Start the show!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: La gente está ansiosa. Dentro de poco, se alborotan y empiezan a tirar chorchadas. (The activists are getting anxious. They will start throwing things soon.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Estoy seguro que llegáran. Eh-solo poquito mas de tiempo, ¿mbien? (I'm sure the choir will be here. We just need a little more time)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Bueno, voy a entretenerlos con mis chistes de Polacos.  (Well, I will try and amuse them with my Pollace Jokes.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Mbien.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: ¿A cuantos Polacos les toma a comerse un burrito?  Dos.  ¿A cuantos Polacos les toma a manejar a Panamá? (How many Pollacks does it take to eat a burrito? Two. How many Pollacks does it take to drive to Panama?)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: In the rainforest, the choir keeps walking

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh God, this is a nightmare! We're never going to make the festival!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Stan	Hey, look over there. Isn't that smoke? [a column of smoke
text: is seen floating above the canopy]

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Let's go, quickly!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hey, it's a fire. That means there must be people.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Children, it's the Yanogapa.  Do not be afraid. We are not here to tear down your rainforest.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Damtilié?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Damtilié?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Look how they live in peace with all living things. Gentle, noble...  Run for your lives, children!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Holy crap!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Damtilié! Damtilié! Damtilié!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Jesus Christ!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Run run ruuun!  Waaah!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aaaaa! Lenny!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (I've gotcha. Let's go!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What the hell?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: We're sinking.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: It's quicksand, people!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: The Yanogapa village. Heads of unfortunate trespassers hang on poles. An abandoned camera is among them. Further on, the choir is found seated around a campfire... tied up individually

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: All we ever heard growing up was, "Save the rainforest. The rainforest is fragile"!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Yeah! Fragile my ass!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Larry, if we make it out of this, I want to be your girlfriend. Even if we do live in different places, I don't care!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Kelly, you said it!)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: the Yanogapa men are apparently no different than other men. They have dressed Miss Stevens in a skimpy home-made red-and-white cheerleading outfit, complete with pom-poms, then strung her up between two trees. They dance around her, chanting "Damtilié"

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Okay. Just what the heck is going on here, people?  AAAAA!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh no, that big thing is going to make love to Miss Stevens!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: All right, that does it!!  Blast these stupid-ass rainforests!! This place fucking sucks!!  I was wrong!! Fuck the rainforest!! I fucking hate it, I fucking hate it!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh, now she figures it out.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: A bulldozer appears, driven by the foreman

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Quick! Everybody help the children!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: more bulldozers enter and spread out. The workers go after the Yanogapa and chase them away. The children brighten up considerably. One bulldozer scoops up a group of Yanogapa and crushes them against a tree, killing them, then backs up over a coral snake, crushing it to bits, then rolls forward over a large insect, crushng it.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Wow!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Dude! Bulldozers rule!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Come on! Let's get you back to civilization!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: HOORAY!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Hooray, children!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Later. Miss Stevens is back in her regular clothes and sits on a gasoline barrel. Kyle sits on another one, and the rest of the kids take positions all over the bulldozer. All sip lemonade

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: How did you know where we were?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Your little friend helped me out.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Eric?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Who'd you expect? Merv Griffin?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What exactly are you guys doing out here, with all this ...construction equipment?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: We're clearing out big sections of the rainforest for a lumberyard.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Really?  That's great!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You mean, you don't mind?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Nooo, I hate the rainforest! You go right ahead and plow down this whole fucking thing!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: That's swell!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Okay, Benny. So in order for our long-distance relationship to work, we'll have to call each other every other day.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: (Okay. I can do that.)

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: (Christ!) [he falls, she gets up and goes to him]

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aaaah! Lenny! No!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Oh my God, they killed Kenny.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You bastards!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Whah?? Who?! Who killed him?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: They did.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Who's "they"?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: You know, "they."

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: They're... they're bastards.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Well don't just stand there, help him!!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Help ...him?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Aaagh!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Come on, Benny! Breathe! [she tries giving him mouth-to-mouth
text: resuscitation, then pounds on his chest again]

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Breathe, you son of a bitch! [she picks her nose, then pounds
text: some more. Kenny coughs, and she listens]

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Whoa, dude!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: San José. The choir is now at the Save the Rain Forest summit stage

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: And now, here to teach us about the rainfoest is Getting Gay With Kids.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Does everybody remember the new lyrics? And...

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Tootin' tootin' to, tada choo choo wow!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Men sing] There's a place called the rainforest; it truly sucks
text: ass.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Women sing] Let's knock it all down and get rid of it fast.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Men sing] You say, "Save the rainforest," but what do you know?

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [All sing] You've never been to the rainforest before.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Chorus] Getting Gay With Kids is here! [Kyle still can't dance

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: To tell you things you might not like to hear.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: You only fight these causes 'cause caring sells.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: All you activists can go fuck yourselves!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: That was so inspiring.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: What a wonderful message.

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Woman sings] There'll be no more rainforests left in the entire
text: world!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Join the fight now and help

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
text: Chorus

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Getting Gay With Kids is here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: To spread the word and bring you cheer. Yeah!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: [Move to E flat] Getting Gay With Kids is here!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: Let's knock down the rainforest! What do you say?!

title: RAINFOREST SCHMAINFOREST
role: It's totally gay! It's totally gay!
